name = "Blueprint example: disallowed properties for storage"
version = "1.0.0"

[customizations]
  [customizations.disk]
    type = "gpt"
    minsize = 590558003200

    [[customizations.disk.partitions]]
      type = "plain"
      minsize = 838860800
      mountpoint = "/boot"
      label = "boot"
      fs_type = "ext4"

    [[customizations.disk.partitions]]
      type = "plain"
      minsize = 53687091200
      fs_type = "ext4"
